verse:
घृतात्परं मण्डमिवातिसूक्ष्मं ज्ञात्वा शिवं सर्वभूतेषु गूढम्‌।
विश्वस्यैकं परिवेष्टितारं ज्ञात्वा देवं मुच्यते सर्वपाशैः॥
meaning: Meaning:Knowing the supreme and exceedingly subtle auspiciousness hidden within all beings, like the essence from clarified butter, and knowing the divine being who upholds the world, one becomes liberated from all forms of bondage.
